text: Shirley Valeria Ripoll Fraga (born 13 October 1982) is a Uruguayan trade unionist, television personality and politician. She is a member of the National Party. She was the unsuccessful National Party nominee for vice president in the 2024 general election. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Montevideo Category:Political activists Category:Trade unionists Category:Uruguayan entertainers Category:Television personalities
title: Valeria Ripoll
